rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall connected to living room with ample circulation space for wheelchair accessibility. Natural lighting via large windows. Vastu-compliant layout ensuring a welcoming and positive energy flow.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the living room, offering views of garden or open space. Wheelchair accessible design with unobstructed pathways.
Dedicated home office area on ground floor ensuring convenience and connectivity. Vastu guidelines for placement of workspaces to enhance productivity.
Area for kitchen appliances and storage. Designed with easy access for wheelchair users including stepless transitions.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with a ramp leading into the entrance hall. Ensures compliance with local accessibility norms.
Large window providing natural light and ventilation. Vastu compliant by aligning with the positive energy axis.

openings.location: Between Living Area and Home Office
openings.description: Accessible door ensuring seamless transition between living spaces and home office. Compliant with wheelchair access standards.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for rest and relaxation. Vastu guidelines ensure the head of the bed is placed in a commanding position with clear views.
A comfortable secondary bedroom adhering to local design norms and Vastu principles ensuring good energy flow for family members.
Dedicated library space with ample shelving and seating. Designed with accessibility in mind, including adjustable seating for wheelchair users.
Accessible bathroom with features such as grab bars, stepless shower, and wide doorways. Compliant with local building codes for accessibility.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase alternative is provided via a ramp integration. Ensures compliance with local accessibility norms.
Window providing natural light and ventilation for master bedroom. Vastu principles ensure alignment with positive energy.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed for two children with safe and accessible layout in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Cozy guest room ensuring privacy. Designed with a wheelchair-accessible pathway.
Accessible bathroom serving the children's bedroom and guest room, adhering to local building codes for accessibility.

openings.description: Wheelchair ramp facilitating access between floors. Designed in compliance with local accessibility norms and Vastu principles.

note: The design integrates industrial aesthetics with duplex living, ensuring functionality for a family of four while incorporating dedicated spaces such as home office and library. The layout considers both local building regulations and Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow and accessibility.
